com.zipsoft.widgets

Interface GeneratedLazyLayout.ComponentGenerator

  • Enclosing class:
    GeneratedLazyLayout

    public static interface GeneratedLazyLayout.ComponentGenerator
    The ComponentGenerator is an interface that allows the client code to generate the used components lazily.

    Note: Using this does not support the modification of existing components. So this interface works best with an immutable amount of lazily generated components.

    replaceComponent() and removeComponent() might work, but you need to handle the bookkeeping yourself.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getAmountOfComponents()
      This method is called only once, and it needs to contain the amount of components shown throughout the lifetime of the LazyLayout.
      List<com.vaadin.ui.Component> getComponentsAtIndexes(int from, int to)
      Get the Components found at places between (and including) two index points.

    • Method Detail

      • getComponentsAtIndexes

        List<com.vaadin.ui.Component> getComponentsAtIndexes(int from,
                                                   int to)
        Get the Components found at places between (and including) two index points.
        Parameters:
        from - The zero-based index of the first component to return
        to - The zero-based index of the last component to return
        Returns:
        The components between (and including) from and to such that they are in displayed order.

      • getAmountOfComponents

        int getAmountOfComponents()
        This method is called only once, and it needs to contain the amount of components shown throughout the lifetime of the LazyLayout.
